name: Escape the Project
description:
Game orignally made for the Metroidvania Month 6 Jam, Submitted to the Jamuary! Second Chances! Jam.

The habitat ixl is hiding out in is no longer sustainable, with all of the worker bots no longer responding to commands. Pack up and leave, while not getting killed by those bots on the way out. 

Controls

----------------------

W/A/S/D - Up/Left/Down/Right

Space/Enter - Select

Q/E - Weapon Select Left/Right

R - Attack
